description: Cream pot and cover. Each finely painted with three cartouches depicting figures in landscapes within perlmutter, iron-red and gilt scrollwork, the three paw feet, scroll handle, knop and rims with wide gilt borders.
dimension: a(bowl)H.3-1/16 x W.5 x D.3-3/4in. b(cover)H.3/4 x Dia.2-1/2in.
title: Covered Cream Bowl and Cover
